definitions.definition: A game which is of no consequence in terms of ranking , betting , etc.
examples: This match is merely a friendly , so don't worry too much about it.

definitions.definition: A person or entity on the same side as one's own in a conflict .

main_definition: ( sports ) A game which is of no consequence in terms of ranking , betting , etc.
secondary_definitions: A person or entity on the same side as one's own in a conflict .
